comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when a user chooses to skip copying a folder. The description will appear in a conflict resolution dialog that prompts users to decide whether to keep or delete conflicting files and folders. Translators should provide a clear and concise message that indicates no folder will be copied as the result of this action.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'No folder will be copied' is better translated as 'Ei kansioita kopioida' to match the passive voice of the English.
The word 'ກ໊ອບີ້' is likely a transliteration of 'copy' and may be misspelled. The correct Lao word for 'copy' is 'ຖ່າຍຮູບ'.
While understandable, 'ບໍ່ມີໂຟນເດີທີ່ຈະຖືກກ໊ອບີ້' is a very literal translation. A more natural Lao phrasing would be 'ບໍ່ມີໂຟນເດີໃດຖືກຖ່າຍຮູບ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບໍ່ມີໂຟນເດີໃດຖືກຖ່າຍຮູບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation contains a subject-verb agreement error. 'folder' is singular, but the verb 'vor fi' is in the plural form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nici-un folder nu va fi copiat

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'කිසිදු ෆෝල්ඩරයක් පිටපත් කරනු නොලැබේ.' is a bit literal and sounds slightly awkward in Sinhala. While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to express the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be 'ෆෝල්ඩරයක්වත් පිටපත් නොවනු ඇත.' (foladera vath piṭapat nevunu ata) or 'ෆෝල්ඩර කිසිවක් පිටපත් නොවනු ඇත.' (folder kisivak pitapat nevunu ata).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ниједан фолдер неће бити копиран' is technically correct but sounds unnatural in Serbian. 'Ниједан' is quite formal and rarely used in everyday speech. A more natural phrasing would be 'Нимало фолдери неће бити копирани' or 'Фолдери неће бити копирани'.
The translation 'Не буде скопійовано жодної папки' is a literal translation but sounds slightly awkward in Ukrainian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the absence of folder copying.
The translation '没有文件夹将会被复制' is technically correct but sounds overly formal and passive in Chinese. It doesn't convey the directness of 'No folder will be copied.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 没有文件夹会被复制 (Méiyǒu fòjiàn huì bèi fùzhì)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: A more natural and concise translation would be preferred for user interface text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 不会复制任何文件夹 (Bù huì fùzhì rènhé fòjiàn)
